name: Shells and Carrots
description:
Shells and Carrots is an endless runner game in which you use two characters at the same time. It contains 10 worlds, 180 levels with different objectives, 15 characters with unique abilities, epic music and more surprises. Also, the game is a constant test for your reflexes and coordination featuring a tortoise, a hare and a bear. The difficulty will increase as you continue the adventure in the Story Mode and you can create your own challenge in the Free Mode. And if you want, you can play with a friend in the same device to share the fun.

Features:
  • Story mode Chase the bear and take back the honey that he stole from the bees.
  • Free mode Play in the unlocked worlds and beat your own records.
  • For one player... Coordinate your hands to control both characters and survive in the attempt.
  • ... or two Play with a friend and work together. Or discover who jumps better!
  • 15 characters During the journey you will find friends with other skills that will join the adventure.
  • 10 worlds A dozen different colorful landscapes to travel while the bear escapes.
  • 180 levels 18 levels for each world that bring diversity of missions and objectives.
  • Increasing difficulty From a walk through the woods to a volcanic nightmare. And in the free mode you choose!
  • Different objectives Collecting fruits, racing against time,
    battles and more surprises.
  • Hero or villain Is the bear the real villain?
    Put yourself in his place and find out!
  • Battles When you catch up the bear, make him stop.
    Even if it's by force!
  • Soaring through the sky If the bear escapes in his flying carpet,
    ride your plane to keep him in sight!

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dtwPUjF1nCM
